Game.Name: Family Feud (USA)
Game.plot: Overview:Family Feud is an adaptation of the TV game show of the same name, in which two families (five members each) must guess the results of a poll with questions like "What food is commonly eaten at breakfast?". If a team correctly guesses all the answers, or correctly guesses one answer after the other family has given an incorrect answer three times, they win the round.This version of the game was published in 2006 by Global Star Software for the GBA, PC and PlayStation 2. It is not to be confused with the various other versions from different publishers over the years, which can be read about on the Family Feud franchise page.
Game.Notes: This interactive version has all of the classic components that have made the game show a hit for over 3 decades, from the quirky survey questions to the Fast Money rounds and of course, features the voice and likeness of your favorite gameshow host!
